actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act for the purpose of providing a warning before a civil penalty is assessed certain person under such act.

summary.text: Requires that a warning must be provided before a civil penalty may be assessed for violations under the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Insecticide, Fungicide, and Rodenticide Act for the purpose of providing a warning before a civil penalty is assessed certain person under such act.
